entry.title: Not just a school but a hub for regional revival

media:group.media:title: Not just a school but a hub for regional revival
media:group.media:description:
Civilnet sits down with Aren Deyirmenjian, the Armenia Representative of the Armenian Missionary Association of America (AMAA), to discuss their groundbreaking educational initiative. From a unique tuition-free private school in Yerevan to an ambitious community-centric cluster model school launching in the border region of Vardenis, AMAA is creating empowering spaces for vulnerable children and their families. Their goal is to provide children with a holistic education along with healthcare, social services, and spiritual values.
0:00- AMAA's unique holistic model for private education 3:30- Expanding to Vardenis 6:25- Education for the future 9:42- Patriotic education 11:31- Attracting quality educators 13:23- Serving Artsakh refugees 14:38- Measuring impact 17:17- Martial education

entry.title: Inside the U.S. lobbying effort to support Armenia

media:group.media:title: Inside the U.S. lobbying effort to support Armenia
media:group.media:description:
Tim Jemal, president of the non-partisan advocacy organization Global ARM, shares how his organization is reshaping U.S. policy toward Armenia through strategic lobbying and bipartisan outreach. He discusses reversing the anti-Armenian narratives promoted by Azerbaijan's big dollar lobbyists and engaging with the Trump administration on strengthening US-Armenia ties, which in turn will enhance Armenia's security and sovereignty. Jemal assesses what's needed for the Armenian-American community to finally match its influence with real impact.
0:00- Global ARMโs mission to support Armenia 1:15- Changing the narrative in DC on Armenia 6:30- Armenian-American community underperforming its capabilities 11:30- Relationship with the Trump administration on Armenia 14:07- Azerbaijanโs strategy in DC 17:20- Supporting ARM Global

media:group.media:description:
ิฑึึีกีญีซึ ีฟีฅีฒีกีฐีกีถีพีกีฎ ิดีกีพีซีฉ ีีฏึีฟีนีตีกีถีจ 2016 ีฉีพีกีฏีกีถีซึ ิฑึึีกีญีธึีด ีซึ ีกีพีฟีธีฟีฅีญีฝีบีกีฝีกึีฏีดีกีถ ีฏีฅีฟีถ ีธึีถีฅึึ ีีฅีฒีกีฐีกีถีพีฅีฌีธึึ ีฐีฅีฟีธ ีซึ ีพีกึีฑีธีพ ีฟีกีถีจ ีฐีกึีดีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถ ีฝีฟีฅีฒีฎีฅึี ึีธึีฑีฅีฌีธีพ ีพีฅึีฝีฏีฝีฅีฌ ีกีทีญีกีฟีกีถึีจึ ิฑีตีฝึ ึ ีธึีถีซ ีดีซ ีทีกึึ ีฃีธึีฎีซึีถีฅึีซ ีบีกีฏีกีฝ, ีขีกีตึ ีฐีถีกึีกีพีธึีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีคีฅีบึีธึีด ีกีพีฟีธีฟีฅีญีฝีบีกีฝีกึีฏีดีกีถ ีซึ ีฏีฅีฟีจ ีฏีขีกึีซึ ยซิปีถีถีธีขีซีฆยป ีิฟ-ีถ ีฏีกีฆีดีกีฏีฅึีบีฅีฌ ีง ีคึีกีดีกีฐีกีพีกึ, ีธึีซ ีถีบีกีฟีกีฏีถ ีง ึ ีฃีถีฅีฌ 150 ีกึึีกีญึีธึ ีฝีฏีฝีฅีฌ ีซึ ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝีจ ีฏีกีด ีฆีกึีฃีกึีถีฅีฌ ีกึีคีฅีถ ีซีฝีฏ ีฝีฏีฝีกีฎ ีขีซีฆีถีฅีฝีจึ ิดึีกีดีกีฐีกีพีกึีถ ีจีถีฉีกีถีธึีด ีง ีีฅิฑึีดีฅีถีซีก ีฐีกึีฉีกีฏีธึีดึ

ีีกีตีกีฝีฟีกีถีธึีด ีฟีกึีฅึีฟีกึีซ ีกีณีธึีด ีฅีถ ีฅึีฅีญีกีถีฅึีซ ีฐีกีถีคีฅีบ ีขีผีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีคีฅีบึีฅึีจึ ิฑีตีฝ ีดีกีฝีซีถ ึีกีฝีฟีธึีด ีฅีถ ีญีถีคึีซ ีพีฅึีกีขีฅึีตีกีฌ ีีกึีคีธึ ีซึีกีพีธึีถึีถีฅึีซ ีบีกีทีฟีบีกีถีซ ีกึีฟีกีฐีฅึีฉ ีฆีฅีฏีธึีตึีจ ึ ีธีฌีธึีฟีซ ีดีกีฝีถีกีฃีฅีฟีถีฅึีจึ ีึีกีถึ ีญีธีฝึีธีพี ีถีกึ ีฐีธีฃีฅีขีกีถีกีฏีกีถ ีขีผีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถ ีง ีฌีกีตีถ ีฟีกึีกีฎีธึีด ีฃีฟีฅีฌึ ิปีถีนีซี ีฐีฅีฟ ีง ีฏีกีบีพีกีฎ ีกีณีจ, ีซีีถีน ีบีฅีฟึ ีง ีกีถีฅีฌ ีกีตีถ ีถีพีกีฆีฅึีถีฅีฌีธึ ีฐีกีดีกึึ ิฟีกีผีกีพีกึีธึีฉีตีธึีถีจ ีดีกีตีซีฝีซ 29-ีซีถ ีจีถีฟีกีถีฅีฏีกีถ ึ ึีฅีฝีถีฃึึีธึีด ึีธึีธีญีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ึีกีฉีฅีฉ ีง ีจีถีคีธึีถีฅีฌ, ีธึีซ ีถีบีกีฟีกีฏีถ ีง ยซีกีดึีกีบีถีคีฅีฌ ีบีฅีฟีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีคีฅึีจ ีฅึีฅีญีกีตีซ ีบีกีทีฟีบีกีถีธึีฉีตีกีถ ีฐีกีดีกีฏีกึีฃีธึีดยป. ีธึึีกีถีธีีพ ีฝีก ีฏีถีบีกีฝีฟีซ ีฅึีฅีญีกีถีฅึีซ ีคีฅีด ีขีผีถีธึีฉีตีธึีถีถีฅึีซ ีถีพีกีฆีดีกีถีจึ
